description.message: Copies url and title of the current tab as RICH TEXT, you can also choose various styles.

copyRichLink_description.message: Copies the URL of a tab as a rich text link, so that you can paste the link with the title to your document(e.g. Google docs...) WITHOUT any editing.

copyUrl.message: 現在のページのURLcopy URL of this page

copyUrl_description.message: Copies only the URL of the page to the clipboard.

copyUrlWithTitleAsText_description.message: Copies the URL and TITLE of the page, they are separated with `|`.

copyUrlWithTitleAsMarkdown_description.message: Copies the URL and TITLE as a markdown-style link.

copyUrlAsHtml_description.message: Copies the URL as HTML-style anchor link(a tag).

copyUrlWithTitleAsHtml_description.message: Copies the URL and TITLE as an HTML-style anchor link (a tag).

copyTitle_description.message: Copies the TITLE of the page.
